executiveSummary.problemStatement: Individuals and small teams struggle to organize and track their daily tasks effectively, often losing track of priorities and deadlines. Existing solutions are either too complex with unnecessary features or too basic to provide meaningful productivity insights.
executiveSummary.targetUsers: Individual professionals, freelancers, students, and small team members (2-5 people) who need a straightforward way to manage personal and collaborative tasks without overwhelming complexity or enterprise-level features.
executiveSummary.valueProposition: A clean, intuitive task tracker that focuses on essential task management features with just enough collaboration capabilities to be useful for small teams, without the bloat of complex project management tools.
executiveSummary.missionStatement: To provide the simplest yet effective task tracking experience that helps users stay organized and productive without getting lost in feature complexity.

mvpValidationGoals.description: Validate that users actively create and manage tasks daily
mvpValidationGoals.successIndicator: 70% of registered users create at least 3 tasks within first week and return within 7 days

mvpValidationGoals.description: Confirm users find value in task completion tracking
mvpValidationGoals.successIndicator: 60% of active users mark at least 5 tasks as complete within first 2 weeks

mvpValidationGoals.description: Ensure app performance meets user expectations
mvpValidationGoals.successIndicator: App loads within 2 seconds and task operations complete within 1 second

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create, edit, and delete tasks
Users can mark tasks as complete/incomplete
Users can organize tasks in categories/lists

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Users can create, edit, and delete tasks with essential information including title, description, due date, and priority level. This is the core functionality that allows users to capture and manage their to-do items. Tasks can be marked as complete or incomplete, providing a sense of progress and accomplishment. The interface should be clean and focused on quick task entry and updates.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to create and manage tasks with basic details so that I can keep track of what needs to be done

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the main dashboard
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the add task button and enter task details
acceptanceCriteria.then: a new task is created and appears in my task list

acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the edit button and modify the task
acceptanceCriteria.then: the changes are saved and displayed immediately
the task is permanently removed from my list

features.name: Task Status Tracking
features.description: Users can mark tasks as complete or incomplete with visual indicators showing the current status. Completed tasks should be visually distinguished from active tasks while remaining accessible for reference. The system should track completion timestamps for basic progress insights. This feature provides the satisfying experience of checking off completed work.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to mark tasks as complete so that I can track my progress and feel accomplished

acceptanceCriteria.then: the task is marked as complete with visual confirmation
the task returns to active status

edgeCases: Status updates with poor internet connection

features.name: Task Prioritization
features.description: Users can assign priority levels (High, Medium, Low) to tasks with visual indicators like colors or icons. High-priority tasks should be prominently displayed to help users focus on what matters most. The system should allow easy priority changes as circumstances evolve. This feature helps users make better decisions about task ordering and focus.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to set task priorities so that I can focus on the most important work first

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am creating or editing a task
acceptanceCriteria.then: the task displays with appropriate priority indicators

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have tasks with different priorities
acceptanceCriteria.then: high priority tasks are visually distinct and prominently placed
the task's visual appearance updates immediately

edgeCases: All tasks set to high priority

features.name: Due Date Management
features.description: Users can set due dates for tasks with calendar picker interface and visual indicators for upcoming or overdue items. The system should highlight overdue tasks prominently and show approaching deadlines. Due dates should be optional but when set, they provide crucial context for task prioritization. Clear visual cues help users manage time-sensitive work effectively.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to set due dates on tasks so that I can manage time-sensitive work and avoid missing deadlines

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am creating or editing a task
acceptanceCriteria.when: I select a due date from the calendar
acceptanceCriteria.then: the task shows the due date clearly

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have tasks with due dates
acceptanceCriteria.then: overdue tasks are highlighted in red and upcoming tasks are marked

acceptanceCriteria.given: today's date passes a task's due date

edgeCases: Setting due dates in the past

features.name: Task Organization
features.description: Users can create custom categories or lists to organize tasks by project, context, or any personal system. Tasks can be moved between categories easily through drag-and-drop or menu selection. Each category should be clearly labeled and collapsible for better screen real estate management. This feature enables users to group related tasks and reduce mental load.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to organize tasks into categories so that I can group related work and find tasks more easily

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the main dashboard
acceptanceCriteria.then: it appears as a distinct section where I can add tasks

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have tasks in different categories
acceptanceCriteria.when: I drag a task to another category
acceptanceCriteria.then: the task moves and updates immediately
its tasks are hidden but the category name remains visible

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Simple user registration and login system that allows users to securely access their personal task data across sessions and devices. The system should include password reset functionality and basic security measures. User data should be private and accessible only to the account owner. This feature enables persistent task storage and future collaboration features.
features.userStory: As a user, I want to create an account and log in so that my tasks are saved and accessible only to me

acceptanceCriteria.when: I complete the registration form with valid information
acceptanceCriteria.then: my account is created and I am logged in
I access my existing tasks and data

acceptanceCriteria.when: I use the password reset feature
acceptanceCriteria.then: I receive instructions to reset my password securely

coreFeatures.mvpScope: The MVP will focus on individual task management with essential features for creating, organizing, prioritizing, and tracking tasks. Users will have personal accounts to securely store their data. The scope deliberately excludes team collaboration, advanced reporting, and mobile apps to maintain simplicity and enable rapid validation of core task management value.

roles.name: Individual User
roles.description: Primary user who creates and manages personal tasks, with full control over their task data and categories
permissions: Set task priorities and due dates
View own dashboard and task lists

keyFlows: User registration and first task creation
Daily task management: create, prioritize, complete tasks
Weekly task organization: review overdue items, organize into categories

requirements: Secure user authentication and data storage
Real-time updates when user makes changes
Works on modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
Database persistence for all user data
Basic input validation and error handling
HTTPS encryption for all data transmission

launchRequirements: All core features functional and tested
Responsive design working on desktop and tablet
Privacy policy and terms of service available
launchBlockers: User data accessible by other users
